title.rendered: This Old House 2011 Best New Home Products

content.rendered: Editors of This Old House hunted high and low to find this year’s Best New Home Products and discovered Eldorado Fireplace Surrounds. Honored as an “automatic winner” for making masonry easier with a half day installation, Eldorado’s Giada™ was the perfect finishing touch to any room.
